content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the performance of other teams or predict which teams will present the toughest challenges for the Calgary Stampeders this season. However, the CFL has several strong teams, and every match poses a formidable challenge. The Stampeders' Western Division rivals, such as the Edmonton Elks and the Saskatchewan Roughriders, are always competitive, while the Hamilton Tiger-Cats and the Toronto Argonauts often present a tough challenge from the Eastern Division. In addition, several other teams in the league have made moves in the offseason to strengthen their rosters and improve their performances. Therefore, the Calgary Stampeders will undoubtedly have to bring their best game to every matchup to succeed this season.
